basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: More than 5 years in the web development sector. I have a preference for technological challenges and problem-solving. Always focused on best practices, code quality, and key organization to achieve application optimization. More specialized and oriented towards Frontend.

summary: Creation of an application for railway network employees with the aim of increasing maintenance efficiency and communication between different roles involved in track incidents.
Analysis and design of solutions to be implemented in the product.
Frequent meetings with clients to discuss new functionalities.
Presentation of product increments in agile demos.
Focused on incident resolution and maintenance of a banking sector application with large volumes of data and frequent task reporting to the project manager.

education.title: Senior Technician in Telecommunications and Computer Systems
summary: Project related to the creation of a lightweight pollution meter, adapted to narrow streets to achieve more accurate and realistic measurement of harmful gases present in urban areas.
Management of telecommunications projects and infrastructures.
Installation of operating systems and telematic networks.

projects.name: Finance Management
projects.description: Add income and expenses with statistics charts and currency exchange
